con:testCase.name: BadCase-RatorService-deductBalance
con:testCase.con:description: In most of test-cases is expected either soap-Fault response or drc-response with error-code=102! Tests negativ technical test-cases from Rator / PSST evolution service: deductBalance based on documentation in svn: ...src\trunk\SRs\Interfaces\RATOR-PSST\ST_TD_DRC_U-036_PSST_Interface_Specification-V3.2.1.pdf ยง 4.2.5

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Fault occurred while processing.</faultstring> <detail> <ns7:deductBalanceFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/querybalance/tgps/v3/" xmlns:ns3="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/getavailablepaymentusecases/tgps/v3/" xmlns:ns4="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/gettopupbulkasynchronousresults/tgps/v3/" xmlns:ns5="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupbulkasynchronous/tgps/v3/" xmlns:ns6="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/subscribepackage/tgps/v3/" xmlns:ns7="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/deductbalance/tgps/v3/" xmlns:ns8="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/tgps/v3/"> <fault> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>No valid data for request</originatorMessage> <errorCode>102</errorCode> <message>Wrong input, Msisdn is not valid</message> </fault> <request> <allOrNothingFlag>false</allOrNothingFlag> <amount>1000</amount> <msisdn/> <referenceId>395ee418bd964b82be20e14027319ab2</referenceId> <balanceType>2</balanceType> </request> </ns7:deductBalanceFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
